page.title: 10Intensive Broiler Production
page.content: Chicken is a prime source of protein This owner managed farm produces 150,000 birds annually, stockedd at 0.65 sq.ft.per bird, using gas brooders and softwood shavings for bedding, in a controlled environment. Temperature at day old 90.F.reducing to 70.F.at four weeks.A processer removes aavd prepares them for market at 49 days, weight 4.5lbs food conversion 2.10.In a twelve day break, litter is removed, equipment and houses cleaned, disinfected, maintained and re-set for the next intake of 3o.000 day olds. Birds are fed and watered by automation. Some costs- Chicks-Â£19 per 100, Brooding and Bedding-5p per bird, Food-Â£180 per ton.These hybrid birds are unsexed, and bred specially for their meat.
